title: No longer Available PSA 1.5 T206 Cobb Sweet Cap Red Portrait - Traded
author: BLongley

posts.post_title: No longer Available PSA 1.5 T206 Cobb Sweet Cap Red Portrait - Traded
posts.post_content:
This was my first T206 purchase and I have since upgraded my Cobb Red Portrait. 

$1625 dlvd, PayPal f/f or PayPal purchase, I have had quite a few successful purchases with members here, wilkiebaby, roulette44, 53browns, and a couple others, but I am just starting to sell a few items (if you're interested in Mickey Mantle I have a couple listed in the 50s BST section - I used to be in the top 5 for Mantle Master and Mantle Topps Master), but am hooked on the T206 and prewar cards now. 

Please reach out with any questions through PM or email me at [url]longley_brian@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks!
Brian
